verses.verse: The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of <S%H2384>vision.<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> ails you <S%H645>now,<s%> that you are <S%H3605>wholly<s%> <S%H5927>gone<s%> up to the <S%H1406>housetops?<s%>

You that are <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H8663>stirs,<s%> a <S%H1993>tumultuous<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H5947>joyous<s%> <S%H7151>city:<s%> your <S%H2491>slain<s%> men are not <S%H2491>slain<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H4191>dead<s%> in <S%H4421>battle.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> your <S%H7101>rulers<s%> are <S%H5074>fled<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%> they are <S%H631>bound<s%> by the <S%H7198>archers:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that are <S%H4672>found<s%> in you are <S%H631>bound<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%> which have <S%H1272>fled<s%> from <S%H7350>far.<s%>

<S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> <S%H559>said<s%> I, <S%H8159>Look<s%> away from me; I will <S%H1065>weep<s%> <S%H4843>bitterly,<s%> <S%H213>labor<s%> not to <S%H5162>comfort<s%> me, <S%H5921>because<s%> of the <S%H7701>spoiling<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my <S%H5971>people.<s%>

For it is a <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H4103>trouble,<s%> and of <S%H4001>treading<s%> down, and of <S%H3998>perplexity<s%> by the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> in the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of <S%H2384>vision,<s%> <S%H6979>breaking<s%> down the <S%H7023>walls,<s%> and of <S%H7771>crying<s%> to the <S%H2022>mountains.<s%>

And <S%H5867>Elam<s%> <S%H5375>bore<s%> the <S%H827>quiver<s%> with <S%H7393>chariots<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> and <S%H6571>horsemen,<s%> and <S%H7024>Kir<s%> <S%H6168>uncovered<s%> the <S%H4043>shield.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, that your <S%H4005>choicest<s%> <S%H6010>valleys<s%> shall be <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and the <S%H6571>horsemen<s%> shall <S%H7896>set<s%> themselves in <S%H7896>array<s%> at the <S%H8179>gate.<s%>

And he <S%H1540>discovered<s%> the <S%H4539>covering<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and you did <S%H5027>look<s%> in that <S%H3117>day<s%> to the <S%H5402>armor<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3293>forest.<s%>

You have <S%H7200>seen<s%> also the <S%H1233>breaches<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> that they are <S%H7231>many:<s%> and you <S%H6908>gathered<s%> together the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H8481>lower<s%> <S%H1295>pool.<s%>

And you have <S%H5608>numbered<s%> the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and the <S%H1004>houses<s%> have you <S%H5422>broken<s%> <S%H5422>down<s%> to <S%H1219>fortify<s%> the <S%H2346>wall.<s%>

You <S%H6213>made<s%> also a <S%H4724>ditch<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the two <S%H2346>walls<s%> for the <S%H4325>water<s%> of the <S%H3465>old<s%> <S%H1295>pool:<s%> but you have not <S%H5027>looked<s%> to the <S%H6213>maker<s%> thereof, <S%H3808>neither<s%> had <S%H7200>respect<s%> to him that <S%H3335>fashioned<s%> it <S%H7350>long<s%> <S%H7350>ago.<s%>

And in that <S%H3117>day<s%> did the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> to <S%H1065>weeping,<s%> and to <S%H4553>mourning,<s%> and to <S%H7144>baldness,<s%> and to <S%H2296>girding<s%> with <S%H8242>sackcloth:<s%>

And <S%H2009>behold<s%> <S%H8342>joy<s%> and <S%H8057>gladness,<s%> <S%H2026>slaying<s%> <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> and <S%H7819>killing<s%> <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> <S%H398>eating<s%> <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and <S%H8354>drinking<s%> <S%H3196>wine:<s%> let us <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink;<s%> for to <S%H4279>morrow<s%> we shall <S%H4191>die.<s%>

And it was <S%H1540>revealed<s%> in my <S%H241>ears<s%> by the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H518>Surely<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> shall not be <S%H3722>purged<s%> from you <S%H5704>till<s%> you <S%H4191>die,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H3212>Go,<s%> <S%H935>get<s%> you to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5532>treasurer,<s%> even to <S%H7644>Shebna,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%>

<S%H4100>What<s%> have you <S%H6311>here?<s%> and <S%H4310>whom<s%> have you <S%H6311>here,<s%> that you have <S%H2672>hewed<s%> you out a <S%H6913>sepulcher<s%> <S%H6311>here,<s%> as he that <S%H2672>hews<s%> him out a <S%H6913>sepulcher<s%> on <S%H4791>high,<s%> and that <S%H2710>engraves<s%> an <S%H4908>habitation<s%> for himself in a <S%H5553>rock?<s%>
<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H2904>carry<s%> you away with a <S%H1397>mighty<s%> <S%H2925>captivity,<s%> and will surely <S%H5844>cover<s%> you.

He will surely violently <S%H6801>turn<s%> and <S%H6802>toss<s%> you like a <S%H1754>ball<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> a <S%H7342>large<s%> <S%H3027><s%> <S%H776>country:<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> shall you <S%H4191>die,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> the <S%H4818>chariots<s%> of your <S%H3519>glory<s%> shall be the <S%H7036>shame<s%> of your <S%H113>lord's<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%>
And I will <S%H1920>drive<s%> you from your <S%H4673>station,<s%> and from your <S%H4612>state<s%> shall he <S%H2040>pull<s%> you down.
And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> that I will <S%H7121>call<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H471>Eliakim<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2518>Hilkiah:<s%>

And I will <S%H3847>clothe<s%> him with your <S%H3801>robe,<s%> and <S%H2388>strengthen<s%> him with your <S%H73>girdle,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>commit<s%> your <S%H4475>government<s%> into his <S%H3027>hand:<s%> and he shall be a <S%H1>father<s%> to the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

And the <S%H4668>key<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> will I <S%H5414>lay<s%> on his <S%H7926>shoulder;<s%> so he shall <S%H6605>open,<s%> and <S%H369>none<s%> shall <S%H5462>shut;<s%> and he shall <S%H5462>shut,<s%> and <S%H369>none<s%> shall <S%H6605>open.<s%>

And I will <S%H8628>fasten<s%> him as a <S%H3489>nail<s%> in a <S%H539>sure<s%> <S%H4725>place;<s%> and he shall be for a <S%H3519>glorious<s%> <S%H3678>throne<s%> to his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%>

And they shall <S%H8518>hang<s%> on him <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> the <S%H6631>offspring<s%> and the <S%H6849>issue,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H6996>small<s%> quantity, from the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H101>cups,<s%> even to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H5035>flagons.<s%>

In that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> shall the <S%H3489>nail<s%> that is <S%H8628>fastened<s%> in the <S%H539>sure<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> be <S%H4185>removed,<s%> and be <S%H1438>cut<s%> <S%H1438>down,<s%> and <S%H5307>fall;<s%> and the <S%H4853>burden<s%> that was on it shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> off: for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it.
